name: chrisboulton/php-resque
description: Redis backed library for creating background jobs and processing them later. Based on resque for Ruby.

suggest.ext-proctitle: Allows php-resque to rename the title of UNIX processes to show the status of a worker.
suggest.ext-redis: Native PHP extension for Redis connectivity. Credis will automatically utilize when available.
suggest.ebernhardson/fastcgi: Allows php-resque to execute jobs via php-fpm.
